text: Ojo nadidai, ej Rasul, ki haroina, Alloh az osmon ʙoron firistod va onro dar zamin darovard, pas onro cun casmasorhoe dar zamin ravon gardonid, on goh ʙa on kistzorhoi rangorang ʙirujonid, sipas hama xusk mesavand va meʙini, ki zard (xazon) sudaand, sipas onro reza-reza megardonad? Begumon dar in kori Alloh pande ʙaroi xiradmandon ast
